title: Shark Professional Steam Pocket Mop
transcripts: Until now you had to use different cleaning tools and different methods for different floors: hardwoods, everyday cleanings, tough messes, sanitizing; they all required extra work. Who has the time? But now, Shark puts you back in control with the all new Professional Steam Pocket Mop with three levels of intelligent steam control. Finally, you can have the right kind of cleaning and sanitizing for all the floors in your house as easy as one, two, three. Set it to dust for steam dusting your delicate hardwood floors and laminates. Just a kiss of super dry steam and you're done, and your floor dries almost instantly. Set it to mop and you're ready for everyday cleaning in just seconds. Or, to deep clean sticky, dried-on dirt, set it to scrub and power through those tough germs and messes instantly. And, you don't need any harsh chemicals because Shark super heated steam kills 99.9 percent of disease-causing germs and viruses with simple water, including the viruses that cause H1N1. Compare this popular chemical pad mop with the new Shark Professional Steam Pocket Mop: both are fast and convenient, both are lightweight and swivel, both clean and sanitize your floors, but Shark does it all with no chemicals and reusable micro-fiber pockets. Plus, Shark gives you three levels of intelligent steam control so you can dust, mop or scrub any floor, any mess, anytime. Finally, a mop made for the way you wanna clean and sanitize all the floors in your house. You save time, effort and money. The Professional Steam Pocket Mop features our quick-drying Steam Pocket Mop technology that releases deep cleaning, sanitizing steam power from all sides of the mop head. And, our patented two-sided pocket technology allows you to clean even larger areas.
